projectTitle: Veeam Plug-in for Nutanix AHV Docs
description: Unofficial documentation dump for Veeam Plug-in for Nutanix AHV. Backup and recovery solution for Nutanix AHV virtual machines integrated with Veeam Backup & Replication.
rules: This is unofficial documentation - always verify against official Veeam Help Center
This plugin integrates with Veeam Backup & Replication for Nutanix AHV VM protection
